Translations.Text: Cite por them ekzempl this life as akv ti ni send cxiel produkt plant ter tiam ili turn into fojn blov vent. DI est able al do all AJX
Mon infan est joys this life righteous works proviz etern recompense el your Lord far bon esper
Tag ven when ni visx mont vi seg ter barren Ni summon them all ne las single 1 de them
Ili prezent your Lord rem. Vi ven us individu just as ni kre vi initially. Ja this est ki vi pretend vol neniam okaz

record montr vi seg kulp fearful de its kontent. Ili dir Ve al us. Kiel ven this libr las nothing small large sen counting gxi? Ili trov cxio ili done brought for! Your Lord est neniam unjust towards anyone
